Job Description:
We are looking for a Land Bank Legal Admin Intern with a strong interest or background in legal studies to support land document review and compliance processes. This role will assist the Land Bank and Legal teams in ensuring that all land assets meet legal, regulatory, and documentation standards.

Responsibilities:
- Review land ownership documents to ensure accuracy and completeness.
- Assist in checking legal compliance for land acquisition, permits, and zoning requirements.
- Conduct basic legal research related to land regulations, regional planning, and property laws.
- Coordinate with external parties (notaries, local government offices) to follow up legal documentation.
- Prepare and organize legal files, agreements, and correspondence.
- Support the team in resolving document discrepancies or legal issues.
